title: Manage Pipeline Drag-Reducing Agent (DRA)
description: To increase the throughput of a pipeline without adding new pumps, an operator injects a chemical called a Drag-Reducing Agent (DRA).

tasks.description: Analyze the current pipeline flow rate and pressure drop to determine the potential benefit of injecting DRA.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that DRA injection could increase throughput by 15%.

tasks.description: Determine the optimal injection rate (in ppm) for the DRA to achieve the desired throughput increase most cost-effectively.
tasks.expected_outcome: An optimal injection rate is calculated.

tasks.description: Start the DRA injection pump at the calculated rate and monitor the pipeline's flow rate to confirm the expected increase.
tasks.expected_outcome: The DRA injection is started, and the pipeline's flow rate increases as predicted.
